1. City Council

City Council
============

* The 4th Tuesday of every month
* City Hall Council Chambers
  1025 Campbell Road
  Houston, Texas 77055

Next Scheduled Council Meeting: January 27
------------------------------------------

[Join our Council Meeting](https://us02web.zoom.us/j/8672676387646)

Meeting agendas/notices are posted as soon as they become available. Council meeting minutes are posted after approval by City Council at the regular Council meetings.
